page.title: 04The New School,Henham 2
page.content: Each fortnight we have the house points counted up.Whoever gains the most housepoints wins a cup.We also have competions when we play Rounders, Netball,Football Sports for our teams. Every year we have a Christmas play.We show the whole thing to the rest of the school and then we show it to the parents.Every other year we go to a place called Selworthy and stay in a hotel.We have class assemblies.These are on Fridays when a class puts on a play. Sometimes we raise money for charities like RSPCA, Ethiopian famine or RNIB by selling cakes or collecting sweet wrappers.
